sqlMap.select: select count(*) from qualifi_certi qc, qualifi_certi_iss qci,mem m ,stare s,em_info e,exkind ex where qc.qualifi_certi_code = qci.qualifi_certi_code and qci.mem_code = m.mem_code and s.mem_code = m.mem_code and e.em_info_code = s.em_info_code and e.em_exkind = ex.exkind_code and qci.mem_code = #mem_code#

select distinct(qci.qualifi_certi_code), (select qci.qualifi_certi_iss_code from qualifi_certi_iss qci where rownum = 1) as qci_code, qci.written_pass_date, ex.exkind_nm, s.actual_pass_date, qc.qualifi_certi_count, qc.qualifi_certi_iss_pr from qualifi_certi qc, qualifi_certi_iss qci,mem m ,stare s,em_info e,exkind ex where qc.qualifi_certi_code = qci.qualifi_certi_code and qci.mem_code = m.mem_code and s.mem_code = m.mem_code and e.em_info_code = s.em_info_code and e.em_exkind = ex.exkind_code and substr(s.stare_code,11) = 'P' and qci.qualifi_certi_code = #qualifi_certi_code#

select distinct(qci.qualifi_certi_code), (select qci.qualifi_certi_iss_code from qualifi_certi_iss qci where rownum = 1) as qci_code, qci.written_pass_date, ex.exkind_nm, s.actual_pass_date, qc.qualifi_certi_count, qc.qualifi_certi_iss_pr from qualifi_certi qc, qualifi_certi_iss qci,mem m ,stare s,em_info e,exkind ex where qc.qualifi_certi_code = qci.qualifi_certi_code and qci.mem_code = m.mem_code and s.mem_code = m.mem_code and e.em_info_code = s.em_info_code and e.em_exkind = ex.exkind_code and substr(s.stare_code,11) = 'P' and qci.mem_code = #mem_code#

select distinct(qc.qualifi_certi_code), qci.written_pass_date, qci.qualifi_certi_iss_code, ex.exkind_nm, s.actual_pass_date, qc.qualifi_certi_count, qc.qualifi_certi_iss_pr from qualifi_certi qc, qualifi_certi_iss qci,mem m ,stare s,em_info e,exkind ex where qc.qualifi_certi_code = qci.qualifi_certi_code and qci.mem_code = m.mem_code and s.mem_code = m.mem_code and e.em_info_code = s.em_info_code and e.em_exkind = ex.exkind_code and qci.qualifi_certi_iss_code = #qualifi_certi_iss_code#
select mem_nm, m.mem_enname, m.reg_num1, m.mem_phone, m.mem_post_numb1, m.mem_add1, m.mem_add2, m.mem_add3, m.mem_photo, m.mem_email from mem m where m.mem_code = #mem_code#
select qualifi_certi_iss_pr from qualifi_certi where qualifi_certi_code = #qualifi_certi_code#
select mem_code,mem_nm,reg_num1 from mem where mem_code = #mem_code#

select qc.qualifi_certi_nm, qci.receive_way, qci.receive_day, qci.dr_state from qualifi_certi qc, qualifi_certi_iss qci where qc.qualifi_certi_code = qci.qualifi_certi_code and qci.mem_code = #mem_code#
select qualifi_certi_iss_code from qualifi_certi_iss qci, qualifi_certi qc where qci.qualifi_certi_code = qc.qualifi_certi_code

select s.stare_code, qc.qualifi_certi_nm from stare s, mem m, qualifi_certi qc where s.mem_code = m.mem_code and s.mem_code = #mem_code# and qc.qualifi_certi_code = #qualifi_certi_code# and substr(s.stare_code,11) = 'P'
select max(qualifi_certi_iss_code) from qualifi_certi_iss qci, mem m where qci.mem_code = m.mem_code and qci.mem_code = #mem_code#
sqlMap.update: insert into qualifi_certi_iss qci(receive_day, mem_code, qualifi_certi_code, qualifi_certi_iss_code, receive_way, dr_state, qualifi_certi_iss_content) values(sysdate, #mem_code#, #qualifi_certi_code#, #qualifi_certi_iss_code#, #receive_way#, #dr_state#, #qualifi_certi_nm#)

update qualifi_certi_iss qci set qci.written_pass_date = (select s.written_pass_date from stare s, qualifi_certi_iss qci where s.stare_code = qci.stare_code and qci.mem_code = #mem_code# and substr(s.stare_code,11) = 'P' ) where qci.qualifi_certi_iss_code = #qualifi_certi_iss_code#
